i am in art school.

content.text: Not much, just had a long day at art school. How about you?
I just celebrated my birthday with friends at a bar in San Francisco! It was a lot of fun.
Oh that sounds fun! What did you do there?
We just hung out, talked, and drank. It was pretty low-key.
Sounds like a good time. I love hanging out with friends.
Me too. It's nice to have people who support you and get you.
Definitely. My husband and I are really close. We met at a dog park and fell in love over our shared love of animals.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you found someone you love.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to art museums and galleries. I also like to paint and draw.
Oh, that's cool! I've never been very artistic, but I admire people who are.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, but it can be challenging.
I bet. But it sounds like you're really good at it.
Well, it looks like you're doing a great job
